name: orderCalculationType
description: Calculation is based on the type of the config : 1) value : order will be calculated and placed on the basis of total amount of the order. For ex : in unnati (ITC client) the value will be equal to the total amount in MRP .2) volume : order will be calculated and placed on the basis of total quantity . For ex : in marsBelgium the volume of the order will the total pieces of the order.
